channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Thanks to Zillow, Your Friends Know How Much Your House Costs—or if You’re Secretly Rich
item.description: A quick search of your friends’ addresses can yield one of the most private details of their financial lives. Some people say their wealthy acquaintan...

item.title: Researchers seek to influence peer review with hidden AI prompts
item.description: Academics may be leaning on a novel strategy to influence peer review of their research papers — adding hidden prompts designed to coax AI tools to de...

item.title: At least 36 new tech unicorns were minted in 2025 so far
item.description: With AI igniting an investor frenzy, every month, more startups obtain unicorn status. Using data from Crunchbase and PitchBook, TechCrunch tracked do...

item.title: Best Indoor TV Antenna (2025): Mohu, Clearstream, One for All
item.description: Plug into free HD TV with these convenient and affordable indoor antennas.

item.title: X blocked Reuters accounts in India
item.description: The main Reuters news account, as well as the Reuters World account, have apparently been inaccessible to X users in India since Saturday evening.

item.title: ‘Improved’ Grok criticizes Democrats and Hollywood’s ‘Jewish executives’
item.description: On Friday morning, Elon Musk declared, “We have improved @Grok significantly. You should notice a difference when you ask Grok questions.”

item.title: How the Binding of Two Brain Molecules Creates Memories That Last a Lifetime
item.description: An interaction between two proteins points to a molecular basis for memory. But how do memories last when the molecules that form them turn over withi...

item.title: 12 Best Kids Headphones (2025), Hearing Protection and More
item.description: If you use screens for work and play, your child probably does too. These are the best pairs we’ve bought and tested for our own kids.

item.title: How to Use Voice Typing on Your Phone
item.description: When it’s easier to talk than type, Android and iOS have you covered.

item.title: How Brex is keeping up with AI by embracing the ‘messiness’
item.description: Brex quickly realized its normal software procurement process wouldn't work in the age of AI and found a new way to test and vet tools.
